title: Queen chats with Covid-19 patients, nurses at UK hospital
description: The monarch spoke to patients and staff at the Royal London Hospital during a virtual visit that marked the official dedication of the Queen Elizabeth Unit, a 155-bed critical care facility built in just five weeks at the height of the pandemic.
content:
Queen Elizabeth II, after her own recent bout with Covid-19, empathized with patients, doctors and nurses at a London hospital last week as she listened to their stories about life on the front lines of the pandemic.

description: Vaccine manufacturers of India announced a major price slash in the COVID-19 vaccine effective from April 10.Both the vaccine houses have reduced their vaccine
content:
Vaccine manufacturers of India announced a major price slash in the COVID-19 vaccine effective from April 10.
Both the vaccine houses have reduced their vaccine prices to ₹225 per dose.

title: Maharashtra govt hospitals run out of basic, vital drugs as non-Covid footfall rises again
description: With the outbreak of the Covid-19 pandemic in early 2020, the footfall of patients in the OPD and emergency sections of government hospitals across Maharashtra dropped by nearly 70 per cent, as per the state’s public health department.

title: Challenges, unmet needs and future opportunities in COVID-19 therapeutics
description: In a recent article published in the journal Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences (PNAS), researchers reviewed the present-day therapeutic landscape of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and addressed future opportunities to overcome challenges that hinder drug development and improve the global preparedness for future pandemics.

title: Agricultural exports grow by record $50.2 billion despite war, Covid-19
description: India's agricultural export grew by nearly 20 per cent in FY 2021-22 to touch $50.21 billion, provisional figures released by the Centre revealed. The growth rate is over and above the growth of 17.66 per cent at $41.87 billion achieved in 2020-21. This comes in spite of unprecedented logistical challenges in the form of high freight rates, container shortages faced during

content:
